profile.lgpdIntro: Under the LGPD, you have the following rights over your personal data:
profile.lgpdAccessDesc: (Art. 18, V) — Export all your data at any time
profile.lgpdDeletionDesc: (Art. 18, VI) — Request complete deletion of your data and account
profile.lgpdCorrectionDesc: (Art. 18, III) — Correct your data in the Profile tab
profile.lgpdInfoDesc: (Art. 18, VII) — Know with whom your data has been shared
profile.lgpdRetentionDesc: Your data is kept while your account is active. When you delete your account, all data is permanently removed within 30 days from our backups. Anonymized data for statistical purposes may be retained per Art. 16, IV of the LGPD.

landing.heroSubtitle: AI that analyzes, plans and generates personalized protocols with precision.
landing.heroNoCreditCard: No credit card required. 3 free credits.
landing.brandDescription: Clinical decision support with artificial intelligence
landing.brandDescriptionAlt: Smart clinical protocols, smile simulations and complete case management.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need in one place
landing.featureAnalysisDesc: Take a photo and AI identifies teeth, classifies cavities and detects VITA shade.
landing.featureDSDDesc: Visualize the result before starting with DSD simulation and whitening levels.
landing.featureProtocolDesc: Receive layer by layer which resin to use from your personal inventory.
landing.featureReportDesc: Export a customized PDF with your clinic logo and complete protocol.
landing.step1Desc: Upload the clinical photo and additional photos (smile, face) for complete analysis.
landing.step2Desc: Detects multiple teeth, classifies treatments (resin, porcelain, crown...) and identifies VITA shade.
landing.step3Desc: Whitening simulation (Natural, White, Hollywood) and ideal smile proportions analysis.
landing.step4Desc: Personalized stratification or cementation protocol with your available resins.
landing.faq1Q: How does the AI make recommendations?
landing.faq1A: Our AI analyzes the clinical photo detecting multiple teeth, classifying the indicated treatment type (resin, porcelain, crown, implant, etc.), identifying the VITA shade and generating a personalized protocol based on your resin inventory.
landing.faq2A: Digital Smile Design (DSD) analyzes facial and dental proportions, allowing you to simulate different whitening levels (Natural, White, Hollywood) so you and your patient can visualize the result before starting treatment.
landing.faq3A: The platform supports 6 treatment types: Composite Resin (with stratification protocol), Porcelain Veneer (with cementation protocol), Crown, Implant, Endodontics and Specialist Referral.
landing.faq4A: You can register patients with contact information and clinical notes. Each patient has an evaluation and case history, with progress tracking through interactive checklists.
landing.faq5A: Yes, all evaluations can be exported as a professional PDF with case data, clinical photos, DSD analysis, complete protocol and your clinic logo.
landing.faq6A: {{brandName}} offers a free plan with limited credits for you to try. For continuous use, we have paid plans with more credits for analyses and DSD simulations. See pricing below.
landing.faq7Q: Does the tool replace my clinical judgment?
landing.faq7A: No. {{brandName}} is a clinical decision support tool. Recommendations are evidence-based suggestions and should be validated by the professional for each specific case.
landing.ctaTitle: See AI in action with your own case
landing.ctaSubtitle: Create your account, take a photo and receive a complete protocol in less than 2 minutes.
landing.testimonial1Quote: I save hours of research on each case. The AI truly understands the nuances of clinical planning and gives me confidence in my choices.
landing.testimonial2Quote: The stratification protocol is excellent, but what impressed me most was the DSD simulation. My patients love visualizing the result.
landing.testimonial3Quote: Essential tool for anyone working with dental aesthetics. The color analysis and automatic treatment indication save a lot of time.
landing.testimonial4Quote: I use it daily in my practice. The integration with my personal inventory and patient management made my workflow much more efficient.

pages.sharedExpiredDescription: This sharing link has expired. Request a new link from your dentist.
pages.sharedNotFoundDescription: This sharing link does not exist or has been removed.

terms.s1Text: By accessing and using {{brandName}}, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our service.
terms.s2Text: {{brandName}} is a clinical decision support tool that uses artificial intelligence to suggest suitable composite resins for dental cases. The service provides recommendations based on user-entered data and a database of restorative materials.
terms.s3Text1: {{brandName}} is a support tool and does NOT replace professional clinical judgment. The recommendations provided are algorithm-based suggestions and should not be considered as medical/dental diagnosis or prescription.
terms.s3Text2: The healthcare professional is solely responsible for clinical decisions made regarding patient treatment. We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use of recommendations provided by the platform.
terms.s4Item1: Provide accurate and truthful information when using the service
terms.s4Item2: Not share your access credentials with third parties
terms.s4Item3: Not use the service for illegal or unauthorized purposes
terms.s4Item4: Not attempt to access restricted areas of the system
terms.s5Text: All content of {{brandName}}, including but not limited to texts, graphics, logos, icons, images, algorithms and software, is the exclusive property of {{brandName}} or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
terms.s6Text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. Any activity performed on your account is your responsibility. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms.s7Text: We reserve the right to modify, suspend or discontinue the service at any time, with or without prior notice. We may also update these Terms of Use periodically.
terms.s8Text: We may terminate or suspend your access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including violation of these Terms of Use.
terms.s9Text: These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil. Any dispute shall be submitted to the courts of São Paulo, SP.
terms.s10Text: For questions about these Terms of Use, contact us via email:

privacy.s1Text: {{brandName}} is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of its users, in compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law No. 13,709/2018).
privacy.s2Intro: We collect the following types of data:
privacy.s2Item2Text: Information about dental cases entered for analysis (patient age, tooth region, cavity type, etc.)
privacy.s2Item4Text: IP address, device type, browser used
privacy.s3Item3: Improve our algorithms and service quality
privacy.s4Text: Your data is stored on secure servers with end-to-end encryption. We use information security best practices, including:
privacy.s4Item2: Encryption at rest for sensitive data
privacy.s5Text: We do not sell, rent or share your personal data with third parties for commercial purposes. Your data may be shared only in the following situations:
privacy.s5Item2: When required by law or court order
privacy.s6Intro: Under the LGPD, you have the right to:
privacy.s6Item1Text: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.s6Item2Text: Request correction of incomplete or incorrect data
privacy.s6Item3Text: Request the deletion of your personal data
privacy.s6Item4Text: Receive your data in a structured format
privacy.s6Item6Text: Know with whom your data has been shared
privacy.s6Contact: To exercise any of these rights, contact us via email:
privacy.s7Text: We use essential cookies for the service operation, such as session maintenance and user preferences. We do not use third-party tracking cookies for advertising.
privacy.s8Text: We keep your data while your account is active or as necessary to provide our services. After account deletion, your data will be removed within 30 days, except when there is a legal retention obligation.
privacy.s9Text: {{brandName}} is intended exclusively for dental professionals. We do not intentionally collect data from minors under 18 years of age.
privacy.s10Text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via your registered email or service notice.
privacy.s11Text: For questions about this Privacy Policy or the handling of your data, contact us:

review.title: Analysis Review

review.confidenceTooltip: AI detection confidence level. High (>80%): clear findings. Medium (60-80%): review carefully. Low (<60%): manual validation recommended.
review.gingivoplastyDesc: DSD analysis identified the need for gingival harmonization. A dedicated gingivoplasty protocol will be generated.
review.noResins: You have no registered resins. Recommendations are generic.
review.porcelainDefault: This case may benefit from ceramic veneers for better aesthetic results and durability.
review.selectTeethDesc: Check the teeth you want to include in the protocol. Each tooth will generate a separate case.
review.aestheticDesc: Smile harmonization suggestions detected by AI
review.addForAutoFill: Add to auto-fill in future visits
review.clinicalNotesPlaceholder: Add clinical observations, relevant history, or specific case details...

analysisView.title: Digital Smile Design
analysisView.limitationsDefault: This case has characteristics that limit the precision of the visual simulation. Proportions analysis is available, but the final result may vary significantly.
analysisView.overbiteDesc: Analysis suggests possible deep overbite. Orthodontic evaluation is recommended before anterior restorative procedures. Gingivoplasty contraindicated until evaluation.
analysisView.gingivoplastyDesc: Analysis identified need for gingival harmonization. Would you like to include gingivoplasty simulation?
analysisView.reviewWhileProcessing: You can continue reviewing the analysis while we process
analysisView.simulationAutoError: Simulation could not be generated automatically
analysisView.simulationPreparing: Visual simulation is being prepared. Proportions analysis is available below.

errorState.hintText: Frontal photos with good lighting and an open smile produce better results in proportions analysis.

welcome.description: Your aesthetic clinical intelligence assistant. AI analysis, digital smile design and personalized protocols in minutes.
welcome.howItWorksDesc: Three simple steps for a complete protocol.
welcome.getStartedDesc: Explore a sample case to see the system in action, or create your first evaluation.

collapsible.title: Digital Smile Design (DSD)
collapsible.gingivoplastyIncluded: Gingivoplasty included in complete treatment. Compare layers to visualize the difference.

proportions.title: Proportions Analysis
proportions.preTreatmentNote: Pre-treatment values. The proposed plan aims to improve proportion and symmetry.
proportions.buccalCorridorExcessiveDesc: Evident lateral shadows — possible maxillary atresia
proportions.buccalCorridorAbsentDesc: No lateral space — smile may appear "tight"
proportions.midlineDeviatedDesc: Facial deviation may affect perception of dental symmetry
proportions.dentalMidlineDeviatedDesc: Consider orthodontic correction or restorative compensation
proportions.lipThicknessThinDesc: Bulky teeth may appear excessive — consider orofacial harmonization
proportions.buccalCorridorOrthoNote: Excessive buccal corridor may indicate maxillary atresia. Orthodontic expansion is an option.

cookieConsent.message: We use essential cookies for website operation and optional cookies for error monitoring (Sentry). By clicking "Accept all", you consent to the use of all cookies in accordance with our

caseSummary.aestheticFunctional: Functional restoration with good aesthetics — 2-3 layers
caseSummary.aestheticEsthetic: Natural mimicry, full stratification — 4-5 layers with optional effects
caseSummary.aestheticVeryHigh: Active DSD, full harmonization, excellence-level aesthetics

veneerPrep.waxupStep3: Wax-up of involved teeth with sculpting wax
veneerPrep.mockupStep3: Position in mouth over unprepared teeth
veneerPrep.mockupStep4: Aesthetic evaluation with patient (proportion, shade, shape)
veneerPrep.mockupStep5: Adjustments and final approval before preparation
veneerPrep.prepNote1: Reduction depth varies according to remaining tooth structure
veneerPrep.prepNote2: Vestibular reduction: 0.3 to 0.5mm for ultra-thin laminates; 0.5 to 0.7mm for conventional veneers
veneerPrep.prepNote3: Cervical margin: light chamfer or rounded shoulder at or slightly subgingival level
veneerPrep.prepNote4: Incisal extension: maintain in enamel when possible; involve incisal edge if necessary
veneerPrep.prepNote5: Proximal extension: maintain contact point when possible

high.label: High Confidence
high.description: Well-documented case, protocol recommended with confidence

consent.title: Terms of Use — Artificial Intelligence
consent.intro: Before starting, read and accept the terms below:
consent.bullet1: This system uses Artificial Intelligence to generate dental treatment suggestions.
consent.bullet2: Suggestions are diagnostic support tools and do NOT replace the clinical evaluation of a dental surgeon.
consent.bullet3: The final treatment decision always rests with the responsible professional.
consent.bullet4: Patient images and data are protected under the LGPD (General Data Protection Law).
consent.bullet5: Results depend on multiple clinical factors and may vary.
consent.checkbox: I have read and accept the terms above
consent.footer: By accepting, you agree to our

implante.summary: Tooth {{tooth}} indicated for extraction and implant rehabilitation.
checklist: Evaluate available bone quantity and quality
Assess periodontal condition of adjacent teeth
alerts: Check for bisphosphonate or anticoagulant use
recommendations: Maintain adequate oral hygiene
Avoid smoking during treatment
Follow pre and post-operative instructions

coroa.summary: Tooth {{tooth}} indicated for full crown restoration.
checklist: Perform crown preparation following biomechanical principles
Evaluate need for post and core
alerts: Consider prior periodontal treatment if necessary
recommendations: Protect provisional during wait period
Avoid hard and sticky foods

endodontia.summary: Tooth {{tooth}} requires endodontic treatment before definitive restoration.
checklist: Instruct to return if pain or swelling occurs
alerts: Consider referral to specialist in complex cases
recommendations: Avoid chewing on treated side until definitive restoration
Return immediately if severe pain or swelling occurs

gengivoplastia.summary: Aesthetic gingivoplasty indicated by DSD for smile harmonization.
checklist: Surgical planning based on DSD analysis
Mark gingival zeniths with millimeter probe
Incision with 15C blade following the planning
Wait for complete healing (3-6 weeks) before definitive restorations
Re-evaluation and impression for restorations after healing
alerts: Contraindicate in patients with untreated active periodontitis
Evaluate gingival biotype (thin vs thick) for technique selection
Verify biologic width before planning resection
recommendations: Maintain rigorous oral hygiene during healing
Avoid hard and spicy foods for 7 days
Do not brush the operated area for 48h
Return immediately if excessive bleeding occurs

defaultRecommendations: Bring exams and report to specialist

checklist: Document clinical findings and intra/extraoral photographs
Request panoramic radiograph and lateral cephalometry
Request study models or digital scanning
Inform orthodontist about ongoing aesthetic restorative plan
Coordinate timing: orthodontic alignment before finalizing anterior restorations
Guide patient on estimated duration and treatment stages
Schedule follow-up for monitoring and restorative plan re-evaluation
recommendations: Bring radiographic exams and clinical report to orthodontist
Long-term occlusal stability depends on prior alignment
Inform about medications in use and aesthetic expectations

checklist: Document clinical findings and pulp vitality test
Request periapical radiograph of the tooth
Inform endodontist about post-treatment restorative plan
Schedule return for definitive restoration after endodontic treatment
recommendations: Bring radiographs and report to endodontist
Return immediately if severe pain or swelling occurs
Avoid chewing on treated side until definitive restoration

checklist: Document clinical findings and probing depths
Guide patient on importance of periodontal control
Schedule return for re-evaluation after periodontal treatment
recommendations: Bring exams and report to periodontist
Maintain rigorous oral hygiene during treatment
Return for quarterly periodontal control
